name: s-tree
description: Segment Tree data structure for storing intervals or segments. It allows querying which of the stored segments contain a given point.
author: Rogerio Carvalho <rogerio.w.carvalho@gmail.com>

scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report html -- test/**/*.test.js -R spec -u exports
